About Our Church

FBC BC is a small Southern Baptist church committed to serving southeast Missouri. We exist to glorify God through worship, teaching, and fellowship. Whether you're new to church or have been attending for years, you're welcome here.

Our congregation values authentic relationships, biblical teaching, and practical faith that makes a difference in our community. We believe that everyone has a place in God's family, and we'd love to help you discover yours.

Service Times

Sunday Services

11:00 AM Morning Worship
5:00 PM Evening Service

5:00 PM Prayer Service

What to Expect

What should I wear?

Whatever makes you comfortableâ€”most people dress casually. You'll find everything from jeans to Sunday best, and all are welcome.

Do you have childcare?

We're a family-oriented church where all are welcome. Children are always welcome in our services as part of our church family.

Is it okay to just visit?

Absolutelyâ€”we'd love to meet you. There's no pressure, just genuine hospitality and a warm welcome for everyone who walks through our doors.

Our Beliefs

FBC BC is a Southern Baptist congregation. We believe in the Bible as the Word of God and Jesus Christ as Lord and Savior. Our mission is to love God, serve others, and grow together in faith.

We hold to traditional Christian values while embracing everyone with the love of Christ. Our faith guides us to be a beacon of hope and service in our community.
